name: UserStyles.World (USw) - WideScreen v.5
description: For the best alternative to replace userstyle.org (which became unusable): UserStyles.world Her my version of it, a Compact userstyle for a widescreen: Less scrolling ! Note: With it, it is possible to have preview on hover Thumbnail userstyle preview if you use an addon like: Image Max URL by qsniyg userstyles.world became better and better , but if you have a request or idea or an issue, go here: userstyles.world Their devs take care a lot of our need.

user.name: decembre
